channel.title: Cant connect with ip only with local host
channel.description: ok guys, ive ran a server before and i decited to start a new one. I halfway know what im doing but here is the issue, i have no-ip running and its updated and it has this symbol-" :cool:" and i have my source running and its compiled to no ip. i have port foward im using a liksys router that was no problem with all the guides. there is an exception in my firewall for "flipscape.hopto.org" port- "43594" tcp. the java is in sync i have "classpath" and "path" with my form of java and my java is in sync with my compiler. but yet i can only connect using-127.0.0.1 (local host) did i miss somthing? java and jdk is -6u13. ip is flipscape.hopto.org. i would like to get this server running, and if u help me and u are intrested in staff position just ask.

item.title: Cant connect with ip only with local host
item.dc:creator: @sureshot sureshot
item.description:
@sureshot wrote:

dude, read above. im not trying to sound mean but i port fowarded right bro. ive checked it like 40 times. it has to ahve something to do with no-ip or a hidden firewall.

Read full topic
